p.k: Cordes d'Orient is a group through which the richness of great Asian civilizations is revealed with finesse. Shen Qi (erhu) and Huu Bac Quach (dan bau) are great interpreters and worthy ambassadors of Asian music. Their repertoire includes a wide variety of works ranging from dreamlike spirit of traditional classical pieces, to the warmth of folklore pieces to the zeal of modern pieces. In addition, their mind-opening allows them to explore non-Asian cultures.
